main event: A ground observer reported seeing a bright white light object moving in a northwesterly direction at high speed over Niagara Falls, New York.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 10 seconds.
Multiple witnesses reported seeing the same or similar objects in the area on previous occasions.
The object appeared to change colors, including blue, green, red, and yellow.
The object exhibited a circular motion and changed direction abruptly.
The object illuminated the ground and then extinguished.
